title: The Wary Traveler
description: It's midsummer in the European Alps. Four young Americans are traveling the well-worn trail, immersed in the noise and bars of the tourist towns. But Jimâ€™s desire to get off the beaten track soon leads him deep into the mountains, where a summertime festival, ancient legends and charismatic strangers will guide him to a strange and unexpected destiny.
author: M.C. Dulac
